SELECT sri.trade_amount AS tradeAmt, sri.pre_close_price as preClosePrice, sri.stock_code as code, sri.stock_name as name, DATE_FORMAT(sri.cur_time, '%Y%m%d') as curDate, sri.trade_volume AS tradeVol, sri.cur_price AS tradePrice, (sri.cur_price - sri.pre_close_price) AS upDown,## 涨跌 (sri.cur_price - sri.pre_close_price) / sri.pre_close_price AS increase, ## 涨幅 (sri.max_price - sri.min_price) / sri.pre_close_price as amplitude ##振幅 FROM stock_rt_info AS sri ORDER BY increase DESC, sri.cur_time desc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sri.cur_time, '%Y%m%d%i') AS date, sri.trade_amount AS tradeAmt, sri.stock_code AS code, sri.min_price AS lowPrice, sri.pre_close_price AS preClosePrice, sri.stock_name AS name, sri.max_price AS highPrice, sri.open_price as openPrice, sri.trade_volume AS tradeVol, sri.cur_price AS tradePrice FROM stock_rt_info AS sri WHERE sri.cur_time BETWEEN #{curTime} AND #{startTime} AND sri.stock_code = #{code}

SELECT tmp1.title, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN tmp.rate > 0.07 THEN'7%' WHEN tmp.rate > 0.05 AND tmp.rate < 0.07 THEN '5~7%' WHEN tmp.rate > 0.03 AND tmp.rate < 0.05 THEN '3~5%' WHEN tmp.rate > 0 AND tmp.rate < 0.03 THEN '0~3%' WHEN tmp.rate > - 0.03 AND tmp.rate < 0 THEN '-3~0%' WHEN tmp.rate > - 0.05 AND tmp.rate < - 0.03 THEN '-5~-3%' WHEN tmp.rate > - 0.07 AND tmp.rate < - 0.05 THEN'-7~-5%' ELSE '<-7%' END 'title' FROM (SELECT (sri.cur_price - sri.pre_close_price) / sri.pre_close_price AS rate FROM stock_rt_info AS sri WHERE sri.cur_time = #{date}) AS tmp ) AS tmp1 GROUP BY tmp1.title;
